relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Very safe campus. Very dense, and security is always willing to give ladies a lift.
Lots of clubs and every Saturday there is a Student Body activity.
Active, artistic, Christian, business minded people.
The clock tower sings every Friday night.
Lincoln is full of bookstores and antique shops. I go rollerblading and hit up alot of movie theaters.
Talk to Barry Forbes. Check out the campus, and bring your bicycle.
Union College is a great Christian school. It is a small school, but this makes for a very friendly atmosphere and the teachers can remember you. The school also has an amazingly green campus.

textBeforeTable: 04/06/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 1 of 28 Hiboombe from Plymouth, MN Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Union has excellent health-related programs and a top-of-the-line education program. Tips for prospective students I highly recommend making campus visits, talking to advisors from your discipline, and KEEP searching for financial aid. Bang for the buck While an education at Union College is quite pricey, I definitely agree that it is worth every last cent. Am enjoying being here I made friends right away when I came to Union and I can already tell that we will be friends for life. The people here make everything worthwhile. Everybody is so inviting and friendly that it's hard to not have a good time. Am learning a lot Professors at Union have an impressive knowledge of the content area and related areas of knowledge. They also strive to connect interdisciplinary ways of thinking and provide an all-around excellent educational experience. There is a very good combination of lecture and discussion at Union College.
